items.title: Introduction to Present Simple
items.description: Learn the basics of present simple tense in this quick video.

items.title: When to Use Present Perfect
items.body:
# Overview

Use present perfect for:
- **Experiences**: I have visited Paris.
- **Unfinished time**: I have worked here since 2020.
- **Recent actions**: I have just finished.

## Common Mistakes

‚ùå I have seen him yesterday.
‚úÖ I saw him yesterday.
items.excerpt: Quick guide on present perfect usage.

items.headline: üìù Don't forget the -s in third person!
items.body: He works, she plays, it runs. Simple but easy to forget!
